index.goal: This application aims to manage planning and reports for your nurse.
index.registration-detail: Record your personal information, about you, your child, your nurse and people that will be authorised to get back your kid(s) at home .
index.run-detail: Define your planning (who and when) or set live arrival and departure times. You can also set up alerts or create event on your own personal calendar.
index.report-detail: Share with your nurse all organization details and report every month. Get comments of parents that use this website about a nurse
